compounddef.title: ISSPACE Test for Space Characters in a String

sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: The isspace functions returns a logical array that is 1 for characters in the argument string that are spaces, and is a logical 0 for characters in the argument that are not spaces. The syntax for its use is x = isspace(s) where s is a string. A blank character is considered a space, newline, tab, carriage return, formfeed, and vertical tab.
